explanation: [0-0] Two young men are sitting at a wooden table, one wearing a black top and the other in red. They have their mouths open and eyes wide, the man in black holding a pink box in his right hand.

[0-7] The man in black pushes the box to the center of the table. The camera zooms in as the box is opened, revealing two donuts. One donut is topped with chocolate sauce and colorful sprinkles, while the other is plain. The scene cuts to the man in black picking up the chocolate-covered donut with both hands, while the man in red looks at it. The camera zooms in on the man in black holding the donut near his mouth. The man in red watches, a puzzled expression on his face, and then turns his head to the left. The scene changes to a hand picking up the plain donut from the box. It then cuts to the man in red holding the plain donut, looking down at it. The camera zooms in on the donut in his hand. The scene then cuts back to the man in black, who is holding the other donut with both hands, a big smile on his face. This is followed by a cut to the man in red, who is holding the plain donut with wide eyes and an open mouth. He then raises his head, extends his index finger upwards, and opens his mouth even wider.

[7-13] The scene shifts to the sofa in the room, where the man in red is sitting with a backpack beside him. He takes out a yellow package from the backpack. The camera zooms in, revealing a picture of chocolate on the packaging. The scene cuts back to the plain donut on a white plate, a hand holding a large chunk of chocolate over it. The scene then switches to the man in red, holding a hairdryer in his right hand and looking at it. The scene changes again; the man in red is now lying next to the table, using the hairdryer to blow on the chocolate held above the donut on the plate. The camera zooms in as the chocolate melts into chocolate sauce. The scene cuts to the man in red carrying the plate to the man in black. The man in black looks down at the donut on the plate while the man in red smiles at him. The camera zooms in on the man in black's face; he shakes his head with a frown. The scene cuts back to the man in red, who looks to the right with a frown and a puzzled expression.

[13-19] The scene cuts to the man in black, who shakes his head helplessly while holding a donut in his right hand. The scene then changes to a hand picking up the donut from the white plate and flipping it over, revealing the side covered in chocolate sauce and colorful sprinkles.
